Reflection: Emotion glyph journaling in Performance Ledger
Studio Lab: Mini-Producer Project storyboard using tablet
Cultural Literacy Components: Practice Hangul stage greetings and gratitude phrases
Discuss collaborative norms used by KPop trainee teams
Map emotional glyphs to moments in iconic performances
